summary.span: 表示用于呈现固定文本的字形集。

span.span: Represents the set of glyphs that are used for rendering fixed text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素表示的输出中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The element represents the output of a in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 以下的标记语法用于描述元素。The following markup syntax is used to describe the element. [!code-xaml[GlyphsOvwSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphsOvwSample1/CS/default.xaml#1)] 每个字形定义度量值，指定与其他的对齐方式。Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other . 以下图形定义两种不同字形字符的各种排版品质。The following graphic defines the various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters. ![标志符号度量示意图](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "标志符号度量示意图")![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") 两个不同的标志符号字符的各种版式质量Various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DeviceFontName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置已优化其 对象的特定设备字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the specific device font for which the object has been optimized.

value.span: 一个表示设备字体名称的 的值。

span.span: A value that represents the name of the device font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当已命名的设备字体的内置支持的设备上呈现应使用设备特定机制，用于选择该字体，并发送 Unicode 码位，而不是标志符号索引呈现。When a is rendered on a device that has built-in support for the named device font, the should be rendered using a device specific mechanism for selecting that font, and by sending Unicode code points rather than glyph indices. 在呈现的设备上不包括命名的设备字体的内置支持时应忽略。When rendering onto a device that does not include built-in support for the named device font, should be ignored. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Indices { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置表示 对象的字形规范集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of glyph specifications that represents the object.

value.span: 表示 对象的字形规范集合。

span.span: A collection of glyph specifications that represents the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标志符号序列形成一个群集。A sequence of glyphs forms a single cluster. 群集中的第一个字形对齐的规范被前面多少个标志符号的规范和多少代码点组合在一起形成群集。The specification of the first glyph in the cluster is preceded by a specification of how many glyphs and how many code points combine to form the cluster. 属性收集在一个字符串中的以下属性。The property collects in one string the following properties. - 字形索引Glyph indices - 字形步进宽度Glyph advance widths - 组合字形附加矢量Combining glyph attachment vectors - 从代码点映射到字形的群集Cluster mapping from code points to glyphs - 字形标志Glyph flags 每个字形规范具有以下形式。Each glyph specification has the following form. `[GlyphIndex][,[Advance][,[uOffset][,[vOffset][,[Flags]]]]]` ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
